sentences.english: It is situated from Beiyu commune about 38 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 格萨尔达拉距白玉乡府所在地38公里。

sentences.english: Epic Gesar is a live form folk culture .
sentences.chinese: 《格萨尔》史诗是一部活形态的民间文化。

sentences.english: It is said that Lion King Gesar Ling States of Horse Circle on here.
sentences.chinese: 相传岭国雄狮王格萨尔的马圈就在此地。

sentences.english: Tibetan musician Tudeng is singing the great epic Gesar.
sentences.chinese: 藏族音乐家土登在表演史诗《格萨尔》。
